body: Virtual Tour           Martin Van Buren by Henry Inman National Park Service  You can explore President Van Buren's beloved home on this virtual tour. This tour requires the Adobe Flash plug-in on your browser. If your computer or device isn't already equipped with the Flash player the first time you begin the tour there will be a brief delay as the program searches for the appropriate Flash plug-in. We hope that you enjoy this virtual tour and will make plans to visit the real thing soon. To begin your tour click on Van Buren's portrait.
title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Virtual Tour
